title: Stream: Formation – White Label EP
body:
Quietly but confidently announcing their arrival on the scene, London duo **Formation** have now released their rather special white label debut EP.

There’s a sleek simplicity in the manner through which they’ve made their music available; Youtube uploads remaining online for little over a week, before disappearing in the oblivion (I’d like to think this is some cutting commentary on the throwaway nature of modern music). Thankfully, they’ve left the full stream of their debut EP online (for now…), showcasing their mesmerising brand of effortlessly cool, LCD Soundsystem-inspired pop. Check out the EP in full via their [website.](http://www.frmtn.com/)
